Title: Dead Zone
Description:
A Klaxxi'va whispers to the tower. It carries their whisper far; to other towers, to mantid, to paragons. The whisper bounces back, and the Klaxxi hear it.

This way, they see all.

A tower near the palace is quiet. This will not do. It must sing for the Klaxxi.

It is my job to fix the tower, but if you serve the Klaxxi, you should serve me as well. You fix the tower, and I will wait here!
ObjectivesText:
Use the Klaxxi Resonating Crystal on the Inactive Sonic Relay at the Heart of Fear.

Speak with Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver at Klaxxi'vess for a ride to the Heart of Fear.
RewardText: <As the crystal buzzes to life, a harsh mantid voice permeates your mind.>
